mapper.select: SELECT r.id, r.name, r.value, r.url,r.description, r.category_id, r.create_time FROM ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role ro ON ar.role_id = ro.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation rr ON ro.id = rr.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_resource r ON rr.resource_id = r.id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId}

SELECT p.id, p.parent_id, p.name, p.value, p.icon, p.type, p.url, p.status, p.create_time, p.sort FROM ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role r ON ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_permission_relation rp ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN ums_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId}
